reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is incredibly knowledgeable and makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Great at explaining concepts, but the homework can be quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the exams are very difficult and not reflective of the material covered.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging and passionate about the subject. Makes history come alive!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Very thorough in her explanations, but the pace can be a bit fast for some students.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Always available for help and truly cares about student success.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: The lectures are dry and not very engaging. I expected more interaction.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and provides real-world examples, but the grading can be harsh.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: A fantastic professor who encourages critical thinking and deep analysis.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting discussions, but sometimes feels disorganized.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Great at breaking down complex data concepts into understandable pieces.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Very engaging and makes the subject relatable to current events.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and provides a lot of useful resources.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Good lectures, but could use more structure in assignments.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Incredibly passionate about the environment and inspires students to take action.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Practical insights and real-world applications make his classes valuable.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Good knowledge, but the course material is very dense and challenging.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: A wonderful teacher who makes learning music theory fun and engaging!

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Very supportive and provides great feedback on practical skills.

reviews.subject: Theater
reviews.review: Incredibly inspiring and encourages creativity in all students.
